pages.text: Rebellion is what happens when your gem decides to stop following your orders and could even end up attacking you. This entry will explain some details on how it works.

A gem will have the chance to rebel every 10 minutes, and it will depend on their internal 'rebel points'. Gems start out with 0.1 rebel points, and will have a 0.001% chance of rebelling without external influence every 10 minutes.$(br2)Unfortunately, there's no way to view a gem's rebel points at this time, but this maybe remedied in the future.

However, rejuvenating them with certain rejuvenator colors will increase their rebel points. The only way to revert it is to rejuvenate them with a Pink Rejuvenator, or by having a Spinel to play with other gems.
